title: The Voice UK's new judge Meghan Trainor joins husband Daryl Sabara
text:
The Voice UK is set to return to our screens early next year.

And Meghan Trainor was spotted leaving The Lowry hotel in Salford alongside her husband Daryl Sabara on Tuesday ahead of filming for the BBC One singing competition.

The 25-year-old singer was in high spirits as she prepared for a long day of filming the first blind auditions.

New role: Meghan Trainor was spotted leaving her Salford hotel alongside her husband Daryl Sabara on Tuesday ahead of filming for the BBC One singing competition

Meghan dressed down in sportswear ahead of her wardrobe fitting for the television series.

She sported a pair of black leggings teamed with an oversized grey hoodie and matching trainers, flashing a wave as she headed off home.

Daryl, who Meghan wed in December last year, looked thrilled to accompany his wife for her first day on set.

The Spy Kids actor, also 25, rocked an equally casual ensemble as he prepared to watch the next crop of singing hopefuls give it their all on stage.

Casual: Meghan dressed down in sportswear for her car journey ahead of her wardrobe fitting for the television series

The couple first met at a house party in 2014 and then in 2016 reconnected via Chloe Grace Moretz. Daryl proposed to Trainor in December 2017.

It was only recently revealed that Meghan will replace outgoing coach Jennifer Hudson, 38, and sit alongside returning stars Sir Tom Jones, will.i.am and Olly Murs.

Last month, Jennifer tweeted that she was not set for a return, writing: 'Hey y’all! I’m sad to share that I won’t be able to join my friends in the red chair for @TheVoiceUK this season due to filming commitments here in the States.

'I sure will miss my UK family, but I’ll be back soon for ‘Cats’ and ‘Respect’! Throw some shoes for me in the mean time.'

Launch night: Meghan, who is replacing outgoing judge Jennifer Hudson, stole the show at The Voice UK launch night in Salford on Monday

Welcoming her into the fold: She will sit alongside returning stars Olly Murs, Sir Tom Jones and will.i.am (from left to right)

Oscar-winning Dreamgirls star Jennifer had appeared on the series for the past three seasons.

She is instead busy preparing for the December release of the hotly-anticipated film adaptation of Cats and will soon start shooting the Aretha Franklin biopic, Respect.

Meghan is no stranger to judging talent shows, appearing as a guest at Judges Houses on The X Factor UK in the past.

In the US, she has been a judge on FOX’s singing contest THE FOUR: Battle for Stardom for two seasons alongside Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs and DJ Khaled.

Of her appointment to The Voice, she said: 'I am so excited and honoured to join Sir Tom, will.i.am and Olly Murs as the new Coach on The Voice UK!

'It’s a dream come true and I can’t wait to sit in the chair with my own button and listen to some incredible new talent!'
description: Meghan Trainor was spotted leaving her Salford hotel alongside her husband Daryl Sabara on Tuesday ahead of filming for the BBC One singing competition.
